name: Tigerspike
tagline: We believe the experience is everything.
description:
Tigerspike is a global digital products company specializing in strategy, experience design, development and systems integration. We deliver business value fast, creating products that are differentiated by the experience, the technology, and the data derived from both. We identify business needs, then design, build, integrate and manage these solutions.
We deliver ROI by identifying success metrics for the business and the user, tracking both data sets throughout the product delivery lifecycle. Our proprietary Intelligence tools tracks these for you from Day 1, from any data source, and extracts powerful insights that drive ongoing value after launch.
READ MORE...
